    1 Year Extended Warranty

    from Acko
    (1053)
    • What's covered - Electrical and mechanical failures covered under the original manufacturer's warranty
    • Validity - Valid for 12 months after comphrensive manufacturer warranty has expired
    • Schedule a repair with just one click; No paperwork, no calls, no stress
    • Log on to Acko.tech to schedule a repair
    • What's not covered - Wear and tear and additional elements of an appliance apart from the main unit, are not a part of the cover
    • We will arrange a technician visit at home
    • Enjoy completely cashless repair
    • Your plan details will be delivered via email and not shipped to you. It will come from Acko Technology & Services Private Limited within 7 days of purchase
    • Acko Extended Warranty plans are only valid when purchased together with eligible new electronic products purchased on Amazon
    • No activation or app download required. The plan is not valid for any refurbished products or if purchased standalone
    Learn more

    Quess Care Extended Warranty Plan for 2 Year for TV 30001 to 40000 (Email Delivery)

    from Quesscare
    (1340)
    • Peace of mind : Protect your device today against any manufacturing defects, which could cost you 50-60% of the product price to repair. Also get convenience of doorstep repairs service.
    • Validity and What's covered : Quess Care 2 Year Extended Warranty Plan is applicable for Television with 1 Year or 2 Year Manufacturing Warranty. Extended warranty starts from the date when the manufacturer's warranty ends. Manufacturing defects in your product which is part of the original product brand warranty.
    • For your comfort : (a) Digital WhatsApp delivery within 10 days (b) Auto-Activation (c) Complimentary Pickup and Drop (d) Unlimited service requests.
    • Remain stress free : (a) File claims through Amazon (b) Brand authorized technicians and genuine parts (c) 15 days’ repair or replacement or refund up to sum insured value with Policy T&C, How to claim : 1 : Go to Your Orders - Get Product Support - File Claim. 2 : Go to quesscare.com - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 3 : Download - QUESSCare App - Enter your mobile number - file claim. 4 : Call 1-800-5721-144 for any support
    • Our Service Standards : 98.22% claim settlement ratio, 15 days to settle claims, 85% customer satisfaction. What's not covered : (a) damages (b) wear and tear (c) theft (d) accessories (e) anything that is not covered within the brand warranty. Disclaimer : This plan is auto-activated and valid only if purchased along with the product on Amazon, this plan cannot be exercised standalone.

    Free Delivery

    10 days Replacement

    Replacement Reason Replacement Period Replacement Policy
    Physical Damage,
    Defective,
    Wrong and Missing Item     		10 days from delivery Replacement
    We will need you to submit proof of issue to verify your replacement request.

      • Defective: Verification by Brand or Amazon, through on-call support followed by inspection at your location if required.

      • Physical Damage, Wrong, Missing Items: Remote verification by Amazon.
      Know More

      Replacement Instructions

      Keep the item in its original condition and packaging along with MRP tag and accessories for a successful pick-up.

      Replacement verification

      During on-call support, you may be prompted to upload an image for verification. Depending on your location, further inspection may be done at your doorstep. Final resolution may take up to 4 days. Find out more
      Read full returns policy
      1 Year Warranty
      1 year comprehensive warranty on product and 1 year additional on Panel provided by the brand from the date of purchase. (Contact Brand toll free number for assistance @ 1800 103 6286 and provide product's model name and seller's details mentioned on your invoice. The service center will allot you a convenient slot for the service)
      Top Brand
      Top Brand indicates high quality, trusted brands on Amazon aggregated basis verified ratings, returns/refunds and recent order history at brand level.
      Services Available
      Service support is available with the product to make it ready to use. Service applicable on the product can be availed on the product detail page or during checkout. For Brand provided services, we will notify the brand once the product is delivered. Brand will subsequently contact to you to schedule the service. For paid services by Brands like AC installation the charges need to be paid directly to the brand technician we will initiate the request on your behalf

      All services are listed below
      • Free installation and demo on Televisions. **Installation at the time of delivery available in select pincodes View details.Wall mount brackets are chargeable if not included in the box along with the TV
      • Free Phone set-up service at the time of delivery is available in select regions. This can be availed during checkout by selecting a time slot that mentions "with setup".View details
      • Free installation on Washing Machines and Refrigerator
      • Paid Installations for Air Conditioners and Chimneys. For Brand provided AC installations, service charges will have to be paid to the brand technician directly
      • Free assembly services for Furniture items requiring professional assembly
      • Paid set-up service on Laptops and SSD
      • Installation/Assembly &/or Set-up services are also available on Dishwashers, Security cameras, Cycles, Inverters, Soundbars
      • Automotive support: Tyre installation, Engine oil change, Brake disk replacement etc. available in select pincodes
      Learn more
      Service support is available along with product purchase for your convenience.

      Many Brands provide the service themselves. For brand provided services we register a service request with the brand once the product is delivered. There might be additional charges in some cases for the services availed. Read more on Brand provided services
      Amazon Delivered
      Amazon directly manages delivery for this product. Order delivery tracking to your doorstep is available.
      Your transaction is secure
      We work hard to protect your security and privacy. Our payment security system encrypts your information during transmission. We don’t share your credit card details with third-party sellers, and we don’t sell your information to others. Learn more

      Eligible for Free Open Box Inspection Details
      At the time of delivery, the delivery agent will open the item for your inspection. Please verify the item is correct, not damaged, and not missing accessories. If you are satisfied, give the OTP that we sent you on the day of delivery to the delivery agent. If the item is incorrect, damaged, or missing accessories, you can refuse delivery and you'll receive a replacement or refund as per our return policy.
      We cannot accept returns for damage once the OTP is submitted. Read more

      How are ratings calculated?
      To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
      View Image Gallery
      Amazon Customer
      5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
      Reviewed in India on 5 July 2023
      Got 50 inch and it was delivered 2 days back. Picture quality and sound quality is very good. You won't need any other sound bar with this unless you want to wake up the whole society. Just one con for me i.e low storage after installing all the apps etc. You get 2-2.5 GB spare which is suffice normally but not if you want to download more games etc. For that you need to add additional pendrive. It takes 40-50 sec to start at first but works good afterwards. Some lag in start but it goes away. All in all, you can't ask for more in 35k.

      5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
      Reviewed in India 🇮🇳 on 5 July 2023
      Got 50 inch and it was delivered 2 days back. Picture quality and sound quality is very good. You won't need any other sound bar with this unless you want to wake up the whole society. Just one con for me i.e low storage after installing all the apps etc. You get 2-2.5 GB spare which is suffice normally but not if you want to download more games etc. For that you need to add additional pendrive. It takes 40-50 sec to start at first but works good afterwards. Some lag in start but it goes away. All in all, you can't ask for more in 35k.
